medium: Woodblock print (tan-e); ink and limited color on paper
title: Nakamura Shichisaburō and Hayakawa Hatsuse
description: The actors Nakamura Shichisaburō as Chihara Sakonnosuke and Hayakawa Hatsuse as the Courtesan Okuni in the play Shinoda kaikeizan 信田会稽山, performed at the Yamamura Theater in the eighth month of 1702
